objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#0f2c3a'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#23867d'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD700;stop-opacity:0.6'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#DAA520;stop-opacity:0.4'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='120' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='950' cy='900' r='100' fill='url(#accentGradient)' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0,300 C100,280 200,320 300,300 C400,280 500,320 600,300' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M800,200 C900,180 1000,220 1080,200' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M0,800 C100,780 200,820 300,800 C400,780 500,820 600,800' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M800,700 C900,680 1000,720 1080,700' stroke='#FFD700' stroke-width='2' fill='none' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='20' y='20' width='500' height='1040' stroke='#1FBFBA' stroke-width='1' fill='none' opacity='0.3' rx='10' ry='10'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Premium unisex eau de toilette
• Fresh, invigorating scent for daily wear
• Sophisticated packaging ideal for gifting

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Invigorating Luxury Fragrance for All
product_details.description:
• Premium unisex eau de toilette suitable for all genders
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with luxurious gold cap
• Fresh and invigorating scent profile perfect for daily wear
• Modern and sophisticated packaging ideal for gifting
• Professional-grade fragrance from BELLAVITA's luxury collection
• Versatile scent suitable for both day and evening wear
• Travel-friendly size that meets international flight regulations
• Premium quality EDT concentration for optimal longevity
• Contemporary unisex fragrance that breaks traditional boundaries

banner_details:
This banner features a promotional layout for a unisex fragrance product, visually anchored by a product image on the right. The left panel contains layered typographic elements with distinct hierarchy. The topmost layer is a bold and vibrant attention-grabbing "tagline" in a yellow sans-serif font. Below it, the "heading" reinforces the product name in white bold fonts. A cyan "subheading" highlights urgency, followed by a "description" list explaining key product features. The "price" is prominently displayed in bright yellow. A rectangular teal button ("cta_background") contains a white all-caps call-to-action ("cta"). At the bottom, "product_details" provides size information in smaller text.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Teal Gradient: `#0f2c3a` to `#23867d`
- Accent Yellow: `#FFD700`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Aqua/Turquoise: `#1FBFBA`
- Gold (used subtly in background accents): `#DAA520`
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and refreshing color palette that communicates a sense of cleanliness and vitality. The main color is a striking **aqua blue (#00B8B0)** used for the bottle, symbolizing freshness and clarity. The cap is a sleek **metallic gold (#D4AF37)**, adding a premium and luxurious touch. Text elements are in crisp **off-white (#F8F8F2)**, standing out clearly against the blue background. The colors blend seamlessly, with the aqua base highlighting the gold and white accents. For an advertisement banner, combining these shades with minimalistic backgrounds and subtle gradients will evoke a modern, unisex appeal and sophistication.
